Informática ( Programação )

Detalhe Da Oferta

We believe transparency, trust and integrity are the pillars of any business and relationship and that is what we promise our clients and employees who join our company KCS IT.

Here, you can be totally sure about this: we value each person that joins us. We welcome everyone as part of this family and we to everything we can so that we can learn and grow together.

What are we looking for? iOS Developer - OPO

Skills Needed?
• Degree (Software Engineering or Computer Science preferably);
• 3+ years of experience with Swift (mandatory) and Objective-C (is a plus);
• Experience working with MVVM architecture and REST APIs;
• Consolidated experience with FRP framework (ReactiveCocoa, RxSwift, etc)
• Ability to testing code and/or writing testable code;
• Experience with CI/CD development methodologies and tools (fastlane, Jenkins, Travis, GoCD, etc);
• Agile mindset and methodologies such as Scrum and Kanban;
• Fluency in English.

What can you expect from us?

Integration in a professional, dynamic and constantly growing team that:
• Values your professional and personal growth and offers you several training courses
• Has a strong international presence and can provide you an experience abroad
• Is always by your side, helps and values you in every single moment

Do you accept the challenge of coming with us?

Send your CV to: *** Candidatura Online ***

with the reference SBA/NE/0121/iOS Developer

We are KCS: We konnect. We unite. We kommunicate.

We fight to offer better services. To go further every day. Together.

Connected. As K. As ONE.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Join us as a Senior iOS Developer to help our mission to enhance online privacy with innovative tools. Help develop Thunderbolt, a revolutionary app that uses domains as IDs to enable communication without phone numbers or emails. This marks a significant leap in internet privacy and has the potential to impact millions of users worldwide.

Location: Hybrid or 100% remote!

Interview Process: This is a 3 stage process: First, a 45 min HR chat. Then a 1.5h live technical assessment. Then a 1h cultural fit interview.

Technologies: Swift, SwiftUI

Reporting to: Telmo Marques, our Backend Team Lead

Your team: 20 people (1 Architect, 2 Technical Leads, 1 Project Manager, 2 Product Owners, 1 Backend Developer, 3 Frontend Developers, 3 iOS Developers, 3 Android Developers, 4 Quality Assurance Analysts and YOU!)

What will make your journey with us amazing?
• A supportive management who cares about your well-being and is invested in your professional growth.
• A culture of continuous learning, with clear targets and feedback.
• A global company with over 2600 employees located in more than 26 countries around the world, including offices in 3 countries: Ukraine, Portugal, and India.

What will you do:
• Drive and support the iOS development team.
• Proactively develop technical decisions and establish coding best practices.
• Design scalable, high-performance iOS applications.
• Ensure timely delivery of high-quality software.
• Review and maintain code quality across the team.
• Integrate and optimize third-party APIs and external data sources.

What You’ll Bring:
• Proven experience driving success in iOS development teams.
• Advanced proficiency in Swift, Cocoa Touch, and iOS frameworks.
• Strong skills in performance optimization and app architecture.

What’s in it for you?
• Embrace work-life balance with hybrid/remote roles and flexible hours.
• Enjoy 22 days + Birthday + Carnival Tuesday + 24th and the 31st December off.
• Participate in team-building activities and events.
• Utilize the best tools and technology for work.
• Stay covered with comprehensive health insurance.

#NamecheapCareers

#HackYourCareer

#equalopportunity
#J-18808-Ljbffr

jobs_results.title: Flutter Developer
jobs_results.description:
Are you ready to take charge and be part of a team that is revolutionizing the future of mobility?

At Daloop, we want to change mobility for good, and we're looking for passionate and talented individuals to help us drive this change. As a tech company owned by Galp, Daloop is dedicated to empowering Galp to lead the Iberian e-mobility market by delivering exceptional value through innovative software solutions. We are ambitious and deeply committed to our mission, and we want to find out if you are up to the challenge.

About Your Role

As a Data Engineer you will play a critical role in ensuring the availability, reliability, and scalability of our data infrastructure. You play in a team of experts willing to fulfilling our vision, by the developing the best code and setting exceptional standards.

You will…
• Develop and maintain mobile apps using Flutter for both Android and iOS.
• Support the entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release and support)
• Work closely with the product team and other developers to deliver new features and improvements.
• Write clean, efficient, and testable code.
• Ensure the apps are secure, high-performing, and easy to maintain.
• Use GitLab for version control and collaboration.
• Share knowledge and contribute to a culture of learning within the team.

Who we are looking for…
• 2 years of experience in similar roles
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
• experience in Flutter application development for Android and iOS.
• Understanding of mobile application architecture and design patterns.
• Knowledge with Git and version control workflows.
• Good problem-solving skills, critical thinking and attention to detail
• A team player with good interpersonal and communication skills
• Ability to multi-task effectively in a fast-paced environment
• High level of enthusiasm and desire to learn. Continuous improvement mindset
• Good knowledge of English

jobs_results.title: iOS Application Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Title: iOS Application Developer

About the Role:

Fintop is a fast-growing technology-driven organization that specializes in delivering robust and scalable software solutions. We are looking for an experienced iOS Swift Developer to join our team.

Description of Job Responsibilities:
• We are seeking a skilled iOS Developer with extensive experience in developing user-friendly applications using Swift.
• The ideal candidate will have at least 5 years of dedicated experience in iOS development, particularly using Swift, and will thrive in taking ownership of multiple applications in a fast-paced environment.
• You will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing iOS applications while adhering to industry standards and best practices.
• The position involves managing the full lifecycle of multiple iOS applications, ensuring they are scalable, reliable, and user-friendly.
• You will administer troubleshooting tasks and quickly identify solutions for any application-related issues.

Key Skills and Qualifications:
• A minimum of 7 years of overall software development experience, with at least 5 years dedicated to Swift-based iOS development.
• Strong knowledge of iOS frameworks, app lifecycle, and design patterns.
• Proficiency in developing user interfaces, animations, and integrating backend APIs.
• Experience with tools such as Xcode, Interface Builder, and version control systems like Git.

Requirements:
• Over 7 years of overall software development experience with at least 5 years dedicated to Swift-based iOS development.
• Quite an acquaintance with iOS frameworks, app lifecycle, and design patterns.
• Must be skilled in developing user interfaces, animations, and integrating backend APIs.

Salary Range: $120,000 - $150,000 per year.

jobs_results.title: iOs Senior Developer (1152)
jobs_results.description:
Equação IT is a company focused on boosting technology and solid solutions through our expert consultants leading a high perspective and adding value to our customers with the purpose of providing optimization and business growth to our partners.

We are looking for a iOs Senior Developer with the following requirements:

Requirements:
• English - B2;
• 4+ years.
• Solid knowledge of:
• ◦ Reactive programming (RxSwift or Combine).◦ Objective-C◦ SwiftUI framework◦ Swift.◦ MVVM.◦ Unit testing.◦ Quality gates.◦ Adaptive Layout.◦ Design patterns and SOLID principles.
• Knowledge of:
• ◦ Principles of TDD.◦ Publishment of applications in the App store.◦ Dependency management (SPM/CocoaPods).
• Duration: Long Term Contract.
• Localization: Remote/on-site, Lisbon, Braga or Coimbra (Candidates must be in Portugal).

Tipo de oferta: Período Integral

jobs_results.title: Senior Full Stack Developer (Firebase | Angular and Native Android/iOS)
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Alter Solutions Portugal is an IT Consultancy Company, promoter of Digital Transformation, part of the Alter Solutions Group, created in 2006, in Paris.

In 2022, Alter Solutions joined the act digital group, constituting a global community of talent in Technology, with presence in thirteen countries: Germany, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, United States of America, Mexico, Morocco, Spain, France, Luxembourg, Poland, Portugal and Serbia. Also in 2023, we were certified as a Great Place to Work©.

In Portugal, we partner with over 120 clients and a team of over 500 people, working in projects for industries as diverse as banking, insurance, transportation, aviation, energy, and telecom.

Headquarters of the Nearshore IT center, Alter Solutions Portugal has a dedicated team of around 30 specialized professionals, integrated into projects with several internationally renowned clients.

Job Description

We're looking for a passionate and experienced (5+ years of experience) Full Stack Developer.

Responsibilities:
• Use a tech stack consisting of:
• Native mobile apps for both Android and iOS
• An Angular-based web app on the frontend
• A backend hosted on Firebase using various Google Cloud Platform services
• Be passionate and skilled in both frontend and backend development.
• Work closely with Product Owners, other Developers and UX/UI Designers.
• Collaborate with cross-functional Teams to embed DevOps practices in the Development lifecycle.
• Utilize Jira and GitLab for streamlined Project tracking, version control, and collaboration.
• Apply Agile Development Methodology to deliver iterative, high-quality software solutions.

Qualifications

Skills & Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field.
• Minimum of 5 years of experience as a software developer.
• At least 3 years of experience building web solutions, involving both frontend and backend development.
• Proficiency in HTML5, Typescript, CSS , and one or more frontend development frameworks.
• Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., Firebase/GCP).
• Proficiency with Angular and RxJS.
• Experience developing and maintaining containerized Microservices.
• Strong familiarity with DevOps approaches and CI/CD processes.
• Experience using tools like Jira, GitLab, and GitHub.
• Proficiency in Agile Development Methodology and collaborative team environments.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and clear communication abilities.
• Fluent in both spoken and written English.

Additional Information

Lisbon | Hybrid model (2x Office | 3x Remote)

Detalhe Da Oferta

We believe transparency, trust and integrity are the pillars of any business and relationship and that is what we promise our clients and employees who join our company KCS IT.

Here, you can be totally sure about this: we value each person that joins us. We welcome everyone as part of this family and we to everything we can so that we can learn and grow together.

What are we looking for? Senior iOS Developer – Lisbon

Skills Needed?
• Computer science degree or equivalent.
• 3 or more years’ experience on similar projects;
• You are very comfortable programming in Swift
• Extensive knowledge of Cocoa Touch, Xcode and iOS SDK
• Experience working with Objective-C (some legacy code remains)
• Knowledge of SOLID Principles
• Experience with the MVP and/or MVVM pattern
• TDD mindset (Unit, Integration, Regression)
• Ability to write testable code and good debugging skills
• Familiarity with continuous integration
• Passionate for creating a great user experience
• Experience working with remote teams- English skills both spoken and written (Mandatory);
• Permission to work in the European Union
• Remote work with clients (Most of them in UK and US)

What can you expect from us?

Integration in a professional, dynamic and constantly growing team that:
• Values your professional and personal growth and offers you several training courses
• Has a strong international presence and can provide you a experience abroad
• Is always by your side, helps and values you in every single moment

Do you accept the challenge of coming with us?

jobs_results.title: PT | Software Developer - Mobile Development_L3 - iOS 271855
jobs_results.description:
Description:

We are looking for a experienced iOS developer.
Experience as mobile Developer for Apple iOS devices such as iPhone or iPad.

The engineer will be responsible for development, improvement and manage their applications and computer software packages in Swift or Objective-C language. Responsible for the technical support of an iOS development team.

L1: Software Engineering
L2: Mobile Software
Grade: C1

1. Must have:
Degree in Technology or Computer Engineering (or similar);
+5 years experience with Objective-C and or Swift
Unit and Instrumented testing

2. Nice to have:
Restful API
Git
Experience implementing client specific Widget libraries
Experience in publish apps in AppStore
Experience with Agile methodologies

3. Availability:
Immediately

4. Seniority:
+5 Years of experience

5. Languages & Soft Skills:
Good level of English
Good communication skills
Team spirit and flexibility to work together with consultants in a different timeline.

6. Location: Portugal (Vila Nova de Gaia)

7. Remote work: Hybrid: 70% - 30%
